name: √ Kla Chaotic Incident(s)
description:
In the chaotic forest, "Kla" the seedling has to survive the cruel world! 

√ Kla Chaotic Incident(s) is a casual, arcade game. 

You will be played "Kla" the seedling to get survive in the environment by homeostasis, hydrated, sunlight, and minerals. Fight the enemy harming you! Adapt your roots of 2 kinds of different abilities. "Kla" can absorb water and minerals by using roots. Most important, lean over the sunlight for your photosynthesis. 

Member

  • Phasakorn Meechai - Manager, Game designer, Programmer

  • Phatcharaphan Jarusawadi - 2D artist, 2D animator
  • Rinrada Jitrawichawet - 2D artist

 Assets from Penzilla and more! 

: Global Game Jam 2023
